name: Etherym Call Leader
text: If this card is in your hand, you can banish this card; Special Summon 1 of your banished Sea Serpent monsters. If this card was Normal Summoned this turn: You can tribute this card; Special Summon 2 Level 4 or lower "Etherym" monsters from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Etherym Call Leader" once per turn.
